generatedPrompts.backCover: A minimalist and serene watercolor painting that complements the front cover. The design features a few delicate, soft-focus fireworks blooming gently in the top left corner, echoing the festive theme. The majority of the card is a soft, textured watercolor wash in pale blues and pinks, suggestive of a twilight sky. A single, stylized watercolor silhouette of the rollercoaster track from the front cover loops gracefully across the bottom third of the design. The artistic style is soft and flowing, with visible artistic brush strokes, organic paint bleeds, and a subtle paper texture. The bottom-right corner, approximately 1x1 inch, is left completely blank and unadorned for QR code placement. No people or text.
generatedPrompts.frontCover:
**Front Cover Prompt:**

Flat 2D watercolor painting of a funny, lighthearted scene featuring two stylized cartoon characters, "Lao Lao" and "Jordan," based on the provided reference photo. The setting combines elements of the Fourth of July and an amusement park. Jordan is comically trying to hold a giant, melting red-white-and-blue popsicle in one hand and a huge fluffy pink cotton candy in the other, with a look of joyful panic. Lao Lao is laughing beside him, holding onto his arm to steady herself, possibly pointing at a massive rollercoaster looming in the background. The rollercoaster has a cart with two empty seats at the very peak of its highest drop. In the sky above, whimsical watercolor fireworks are blooming in soft, festive colors. The entire scene is rendered in a soft, flowing watercolor style with visible artistic brush strokes, organic paint bleeds, and a subtle paper texture. In the center, written in a beautiful, readable, and elegant handwritten cursive script, is the text "Thank you for being the best".

CRITICAL CHARACTER REFERENCE INSTRUCTIONS: I have provided a reference photo as input image. You MUST create cartoon/illustrated characters that accurately represent ONLY the people who are actually visible in this reference photo with high fidelity to their appearance.

MANDATORY CHARACTER MATCHING REQUIREMENTS - ONLY INCLUDE WHAT IS ACTUALLY VISIBLE:
- REPRESENT ONLY PEOPLE ACTUALLY IN THE PHOTOS: Create cartoon versions of ONLY the people who are actually shown in the reference photos. Do NOT add, create, or imagine any additional people not present in the reference images.
- EXACT hair color, hair style, and hair length from each reference photo - only what is actually visible
- PRECISE facial features for each person: eye color, eye shape, nose shape, face structure, skin tone - exactly as shown in the reference
- ACCURATE clothing: replicate ONLY the EXACT clothing items, colors, patterns, and styles actually worn by each person in their reference photo - do not add or change any clothing items
- ACCESSORIES ONLY IF VISIBLE: Include accessories (glasses, jewelry, hats, watches, bags, etc.) ONLY if they are actually visible on each person in the reference photo. DO NOT add glasses if they are not wearing glasses in the photo. DO NOT add jewelry if they are not wearing jewelry in the photo. DO NOT add any accessories that are not clearly visible in the reference image.
- CORRECT body proportions and posture as shown for each person in their reference
- FAITHFUL age representation and gender presentation for each individual - exactly as they appear
- AUTHENTIC facial expressions and poses from the reference images, lean towards making the people look happier unless the user specifically asks for a different expression
- GROUP COMPOSITION: If multiple people are actually shown in the photos, arrange them naturally together in a pleasing composition that fits the card's theme

CRITICAL RESTRICTION: Do not add, remove, or modify any visual elements beyond what is actually visible in the reference photos. Only include people, clothing, and accessories that are clearly shown in the reference images.

Study every detail of the people actually in the reference image and recreate them as stylized cartoon characters while maintaining 100% accuracy to their distinctive visual features. The characters must be immediately recognizable as the same people from the reference photo. Pay special attention to clothing details and accessories that are actually visible, and unique personal style elements that make each person distinctive. Do not add or imagine any elements not present in the reference.

The cartoon style should be charming and artistic while preserving complete visual accuracy to the reference photo. Only represent people, clothing, and accessories that are actually visible in the reference images.
generatedPrompts.leftInterior: A beautiful, decorative watercolor painting serving as a full-bleed background. The artwork features an abstract pattern inspired by the elements on the front cover. A playful mix of melting popsicle drips in red and blue, fluffy pink cotton candy clouds, and looping rollercoaster track silhouettes are scattered artfully across the page. The composition is light and airy, rendered in a soft, flowing watercolor style with visible artistic brush strokes, organic paint bleeds, and a subtle paper texture, creating a whimsical and cohesive feel. No people or text. Key artistic elements are kept at least 10% away from the top and bottom edges.
generatedPrompts.rightInterior:
A decorative watercolor background that harmonizes with the overall card design. The background is a soft, textured wash of pale blues and pinks. A few whimsical, soft-focus watercolor firework bursts decorate the top and bottom corners, framing the space. Centered on the page, the following message is written in a beautiful, readable, and elegant handwritten cursive script: "Lao Lao, thanks for an amazing summer! I'm still not sure what was more explosive, the Fourth of July fireworks or my stomach after all those rollercoasters at the amusement park. Honestly, surviving both with you officially makes you the best girlfriend ever.

All my love,
Jordan". The artwork and text are rendered in the same soft, flowing watercolor style with visible artistic brush strokes and organic paint bleeds. The text and key design elements are positioned at least 0.5 inches from the left and right edges and 10% from the top and bottom edges. No people or characters.
